live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

42165.summary: Some customers in the Valley Gardens area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42165.title: Sept 23 – Winnipeg (Valley Gardens) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
